=== (ongoing) ===

=== 0.4.X ===

- fixed clean method
- added Outlet.start_date, end_date and outlet_type
- added list_filter for Outlet admin

=== 0.3 ===

- using new django_libs map.js utils
- added ``get_outlet_countries`` template tag

=== 0.2 ===

- added customizable mapmarker infoboxes
- added centering on map markers when clicking on outlet information

=== 0.1 ===

- Initial commit
